name: NS WordPress Custom Alert Popup Box
author: NsThemes

sections.description:
Install plugin and create your simple alert popup box.
You can using a WordPress editor to write or insert a media in alert popup box.
There are different option you can chose:

  • Show popup at the first visit of the day
  • Test mode
  • Contact Form 7 ready
  • Shortcode ready (you can use any shortcode)
  • Full control on popup content
  • Standard WordPress content editor
  • Set a delay to start popup box
  • Responsive mobile friendly popup
  • Insert image in popup box
  • Choose full width layer background color
  • Choose full width layer opacity
  • Set popup background color
  • Set popup border width and color
  • Set popup content padding

For more information about the PREMIUM version of NS WordPress Custom Alert Popup Box, visit its official page on NsThemes marketplace.

We test our plugins with many other. If you find incompatibility with one specific plugin, please inform us at report@nsthemes.com.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire ‘ns-wordpress-custom-alert-popup-box’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. View admin menu, then click on ‘Settings’ -> ‘NS WordPress Custom Alert Popup Box’
sections.faq:
The alert popup box are responsive?

Yes the alert popup box still remain in the middle. And size be due to content.

Can i use a Contact Form 7 shortcode?

Yes you can install and use Contact Form 7 shortcode.

Code is required to use this plugin?

No code require to use this plugin.

short_description: Easy way to show a totally customizable popup to user or customer. Inside your popup, you can add shortcode, text and images thanks to WYSIWYG editor.
